content: single_crochet 9 single_crochet stuff w/ stuffing of your choice rounds 11-16 repeat round 3 stuff w/ stuffing of your choice round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 6 single_crochet finish off stuff w/ stuffing of your choice round 18 for stem w/ green join w/ single_crochet in any st single_crochet around round 19 chain 1 single_crochet decrease around 3 single_crochet finish off zucchini foundation round w/ green chain 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in next chain 2 single_crochet in next chain then single_crochet in next 2 free loops on the other side of the chain 2 single_crochet in last free loop join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 8 single_crochet round 1 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in remaining single_crochet join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 10 single_crochet rounds 2-14 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 8 single_crochet round 16 repeat round 2 round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 6 single_crochet finish off stuff w/ stuffing of your choice round 18 for stem w/ green join w/ single_crochet in any st single_crochet around round 19 chain 1 single_crochet decrease around 3 single_crochet finish off if you need further help with this pattern please feel free to contact me at patti@dandeliondreamers com copyright © 2005 by patti
